meta.purpose: UI/UX mockup for an actor/person detail page with biography and filmography grid
meta.notes_for_model: This is a deep dive into an actor or crew member's career - their biography, filmography, and connections to shows in the user's library. It should feel like browsing an IMDb page but with premium magazine aesthetics.

story.one_sentence_brief: An actor profile page featuring a large portrait photo on the left, biography and vital stats on the right, followed by a comprehensive filmography grid of poster cards with filters for role type (Acting/Crew) and media type (TV/Movies).
story.additional_context: This is where users discover more about actors they see in shows. The filmography highlights which titles are already in the user's library, encouraging discovery of related content.

scene.subject: A person/actor detail page with a hero section showing a large 2:3 ratio portrait photo on the left and biographical information on the right including name, birth date, birthplace, and a truncatable biography. Below is a filmography section with filter controls (All | Acting | Crew and All | TV | Movies) and a responsive grid of poster cards representing the actor's credits. Cards that are in the user's library have a gold bookmark badge.
secondary_subjects: Large professional portrait photo with gold border accent
Vital stats (Born, Birthplace, Known For) with label/value styling
Biography text with 'Read full biography' expansion link
Quick stats badges ('In Your Library' count, Total Credits, Career Span)
Sticky filter bar with segmented controls
Filmography poster grid with 'In Library' gold bookmark badges
Character/role and year information on poster cards
scene.action: Static UI mockup showing the complete person detail page with hero and filmography grid
scene.location: Digital web browser frame showing the actor page at desktop resolution
scene.time_of_day: Neutral - portrait photography sets the mood
scene.mood: Informative and exploratory, like reading a feature profile in an entertainment magazine - appreciation and discovery

composition.shot_type: Full page screenshot/mockup view showing the complete actor detail page
composition.framing: Hero section with photo and bio takes top portion. Sticky filter bar below. Filmography grid fills remaining space with 5-6 columns of poster cards.

style.medium: High-fidelity digital UI design mockup with portrait photography integration
style.era_or_reference: IMDB actor page meets Letterboxd aesthetics meets premium magazine profile - comprehensive career view with editorial quality
style.color_palette: Gradient background from cinema dark to deep night, portrait photo as visual anchor, cinema gold (#D4A853) for 'In Library' badges and active filters, elevated surface cards (#1C2230), warm white text, muted cream for secondary, glass effect for filter bar

lighting.description: Portrait photo provides professional lighting as the main visual anchor. Filmography posters have their own imagery. Background is subtly gradient dark. Filter bar has glass blur effect.
lighting.color_and_contrast: High contrast between dark background and portrait photo. Gold badges pop on poster cards. Text is highly legible.

format.surface_or_output: Desktop web browser mockup at 1920x1080 or higher

constraints.factual_accuracy: Filmography grid should be properly aligned. Poster aspect ratios should be 2:3. Filter controls should look functional. Badge counts should be realistic.
constraints.safety_and_rights: Use generic silhouette or artistic representation for the actor portrait, not a real person's photo. Movie/TV posters should be conceptual, not real content.
